definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: So in diplomatic terms, the Kitty Hawk refusal was a pretty sharp rebuke.
sentences.chinese: 因此從外交層面來看，小鷹號被拒是相當尖銳的指責。

sentences.english: The Kitty Hawk visited there for a Thanksgiving stopover in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 小鷹號在2005年感恩節曾在香港停泊過。

sentences.english: Hey Sarge spent a year at Camp Kitty hawk in the 70s 3rd PLT.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，70年代本長官在小鷹號航母上呆了一年時間。
